tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE security_incidents (
  incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  incident_date DATE,
  incident_type VARCHAR(50),
  description TEXT,
  severity INT
)

CREATE TABLE security_incidents (
    incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_date DATE,
    incident_description TEXT,
    reported_by VARCHAR(50),
    status VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE incident_reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_id INT,
    report_date DATE,
    report_details TEXT,
    compliance_status VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE compliance_audit (
    audit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_id INT,
    audit_date DATE,
    auditor_name VARCHAR(50),
    audit_result VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE security_incidents (
    incident_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_date DATE,
    incident_type VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE incident_details (
    detail_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_id INT,
    reporter_name VARCHAR(255),
    report_date DATE,
    details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE compliance_reports (
    report_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_id INT,
    report_date DATE,
    compliance_status VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE security_incidents (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    description TEXT,
    severity INT
)

CREATE TABLE incident_locations (
    location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_name TEXT,
    address TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE incident_reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_id INT,
    report_date DATE,
    report_details TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE compliance_reports (
    compliance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_id INT,
    compliance_date DATE,
    compliance_details TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE incident_types (
    type_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    type_name TEXT,
    details TEXT
)
